eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A CHILD ABDUCTION EMERGENCY FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Missouri; AT 12:29 AM ON SEP 20, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 12:29 AM SEP 21, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text:
THE ATCHISON COUNTY SHERIFF'S DEPARTMENT HAS ISSUED AN AMBER ALERT FOR A CHILD ABDUCTION THAT OCCURRED AT 600 SOUTH NEBRASKA STREET ,  ROCK PORT, MISSOURI ON 09/19/2025 AT 08:40 PM.  

ABDUCTED WAS EMMA SUE HALE, WHITE, FEMALE, AGE 12. 
ABDUCTED WAS EMILY HARRINGTON, WHITE, FEMALE, AGE 12. 

SUSPECT is ALEC A WHITE, MALE. 

VICTIM EMMA SUE HALE is 5 FEET 2 INCHES TALL, 120 POUNDS, HAS DARK BLUE HAIR. 
LAST SEEN WEARING A RED CHIEF'S HOODED SWEATSHIRT AND BLACK LEGGINGS. 
VICTIM HAS HAS VERY LONG HAIR. 

VICTIM EMILY HARRINGTON is 5 FEET 4 INCHES TALL, 135 POUNDS, HAS BROWN HAIR. 
LAST SEEN WEARING A BROWN T-SHIRT, LIGHT COLORED LEGGINGS, AND COWBOY BOOTS. 
VICTIM HAS OFTEN WEARS HAIR IN A BUN.  HAS A BIRTHMARK ON THE FRONT OF HER NECK. 

HARRINGTON AND HALE WERE LAST SEEN AT A FOOTBALL AT THE ROCK PORT MISSOURI HIGH SCHOOL.  THE TWO JUVENILES MIGHT BE IN THE COMPANY OF A MALE WHITE WHOSE NAME IS POSSIBLY ALEC OR ALEX.  PHOTOS TO BE ADDED AT A LATER TIME.  TROOP H. 

PLEASE CALL 9 1 1 OR ATCHISON COUNTY SHERIFF'S DEPARTMENT AT 660-744-6271 IF YOU HAVE ANY INFORMATION PERTAINING TO THIS ALERT.
